alert.note: Alert for Switzerland (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued March 03 at 3:58PM EST until March 13 at 11:17AM EST by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 430 PM EST FOR OHIO...SWITZERLAND...CARROLL...OWEN AND GALLATIN COUNTIES... At 358 PM EST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 7 miles northwest of Vevay to 6 miles south of New Castle, moving northeast at 65 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and power lines. Locations impacted include... Carrollton, Rising Sun, Vevay, Warsaw, Owenton, Florence, Kentucky Speedway, Patriot, Pleasant, French, Hartford, Glencoe, Fairview, Ghent, Sanders, Sparta, Worthville, Prestonville, Monterey and Gratz. This includes I-71 in Kentucky between mile markers 39 and 65. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 700 PM EST for southeastern Indiana...and northern Kentucky. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
